data.choissierlenom: Choose the name of your team.
data.moreInfoDesc:
Create, modify your team ! 
 Add the players whom you have just gained or buy ! 
 Ducats allows to create a team well-balanced. Every players cost maximum 10 Ducats. You can count it until 25 in a same team!

data.autoriseSaveDesc: save your games on our devices to watch them in offline mode.
data.cleanSaveDesc: delete all your replays which are on your computer
data.msgdicdac4: The purpose of the game is to mark 3 points
data.msgdicdac6:
Let us begin by seeing the controls 
 of Swungman
data.msgdicdac7:
The capacities of travels are represented
 by the color blue
data.msgdicdac8:
Press on the blue button 3 times to make him 
 run faster and farthest possible
data.msgdicdac9:
Click the (blue) zone of travel for contoller 
 the movement
data.msgdicdac10: Well, now we will see how take the ball
data.msgdicdac11:
To get back the ball and make a pass, 
 is needed at least a point of pass
data.msgdicdac12:
Puts 1 point of control in the pass and 
 2 points in the running
data.msgdicdac13: We have now the ball, let us send her somewhere
data.msgdicdac14:
To send the ball,
 is needed at least a point of control of pass
data.msgdicdac15: Put 3 points of control in the pass to make one pass very far
data.msgdicdac16:
Click on the pink zone, then moves the cursor 
 to mark the direction of the pass
data.msgdicdac17:
Move the Swungman up to here 
 and press 'Espace' to launch the travel
data.msgdicdac18: Move you towards the ball, ('Space' to launch the travel)
